com.pcloud.networking.client

Class PCloudAPIClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pcloud.networking.client.PCloudAPIClient

  • public class PCloudAPIClient
extends java.lang.Object
    An implementation of a client used to make network calls

    Used to produce Call and MultiCall objects to make network requests to the server

    See Also:
    MultiCall, Call, Request, Response, MultiResponse, RequestInterceptor

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  PCloudAPIClient.Builder
      Builds instances of the PCloudAPIClient and allows different properties to be set as needed

    • Method Detail

      • newCall

        public Call newCall(Request request)
        Produces a new instance of a Call object to make a network call
        Parameters:
        request - A Request for this call
        Returns:
        A new instance of a Call object with the specified Request
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - on a null Request argument

      • newCall

        public MultiCall newCall(java.util.Collection<Request> requests)
        Produces a new instance of a MultiCall object to make multiple network calls

        Note that all requests you wish to execute with a MultiCall need to be opted for the same endpoint.

        Parameters:
        requests - A Collection of Request objects for this call
        Returns:
        A new instance of a MultiCall object with the specified requests
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - on a null Collection, on an empty Collection, on a Collection containing null elements or if the Collection contains Request objects opted for different endpoints
